data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains data used for analysis in the manuscript entitled "It’s a trap! Invasive common mynas learn socially about control-related cues" by Marie C. Diquelou and Andrea S. Griffin, published in Behavioral Ecology. For details please refer to the manuscript and the readme file attached.
common myna|social learning|invasive birds|threat perception|population management|Indian mynah
